snippet: The feud between the Fox News anchor and the leading Republican candidate for president has been a strange subplot in a confounding election year.
abstract: Donald J Trump meets with Fox News anchor Megyn Kelly for hour in New York City, first interaction between them in months; pair reach tentative truce in long-running feud.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and JIM RUTENBERG
byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The feud between the Fox News anchor and the leading Republican candidate for president has been a strange subplot in a confounding election year.

headline.main: Megyn Kelly Meets With Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: A Trump-Kelly Sit-Down  Yields a Tentative Truce
